title: Bug 116744 - Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field with three types of content: 1) HTML text within the <html> tag, 2) HTML fragments not within the <html> tag, and 3) Text with RTF tags, the dynamic text content type has no effect.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1) Create a database field with the three types of content. 2) Use a dynamic text element to display the field content. Observe that the dynamic text content type does not affect the display of the content.
